description: This kit includes all the basics for on-the-go photography.The adapter provides you with full control for the positioning your flash using the easy to adjust wingnuts. With the built-in umbrella holder at the base, you can have portable studio lighting without the hassle.The translucent umbrella is a great addition to your studio setup. This umbrella works well to diffuse the light from any flash, creating a soft even light for your subject. The lack of a black backing gives this umbrella the ability to flash through the umbrella if needed and simulate the effects of a softbox. Portability is a plus for location shots. This size is good for head shots and small to medium sized products.The light stand is perfect for the studio photographer. Made from strong aluminum alloy, it can be used with reflectors, boom stands, strobe flash lights, and backgrounds.Swivel flash mount:Made from aluminum alloyFits on the top of most standard light stands or tripodsHolds any standard flashIncludes umbrella holder at the base of the mountEasy to adjust the angle of the flash33in translucent umbrella:33in diameterUseful for shoot through photography to simulate the effects of a softboxEasy to assemble/disassembleCompact and easy to storeOne-year manufacturer warrantyAluminum light stand (W803):Height is adjustable from 2ft 8in to 6ft 2in5/8in stem¼in screw tip on the stemUses quick release levers, allowing full and smooth height adjustmentsFootprint is 2ft 6in to provide extra stabilityMade from aluminum alloy with a professional black satin finishSpring cushionedFolds up quickly and easily2ft 3in long when closedMax load of 7 lbsOne-year warranty
title: CowboyStudio Single Flash Shoe Swivel Bracket Kit with 1 Mounting Bracket, 1 Umbrella, and 1 Stand Stand
